item.description: Core concepts and definitions of Story, focusing on structure, emotion, and transformation.

item.title: Plaintiff
item.description: A party bringing a suit in civil law against a defendant; accusers.

item.title: Polymath
item.description: A Person who knows a lot about different subjects

item.title: A Note on Distributed Computing
item.description: Notes from the paper by Jim Waldo, Geoff Wyant, Ann Wollrath and Sam Kendall about Distributed computing

item.title: Application layout engine
item.description: Application layout engines manage the arrangement of user interface (UI) components within software applications, ensuring that elements are displayed correctly across different devices and screen sizes.

item.title: Document layout engine
item.description: A document layout engine is a software program or library that is used to render and format the layout of a document.

item.title: Footnotes in Markdown
item.description: Syntax to create footnotes in Markdown

item.title: Influencer Marketing
item.description: Notes about influencer marketing - Data, recommendations and ideas

item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: A Digital Garden/Zettelkasten is a personal tool for thinking and writing. It has hypertextual features to make a web of thought possible.

item.title: stultus
item.description: ‘Stultus’ is a Latin word and it means ‘Stupid/Foolish’. On the internet, ‘stultus’ is the pseudonym adopted by Hrishikesh Bhaskaran.

item.title: Cyber bullying
item.description: The use of electronic communication to bully a person, typically by sending messages of an intimidating or threatening nature.

item.title: Cyber Crime
item.description: Note compiled by Athira Sujatha, Priyanka Navle, Adv. Anupama Sripathi and Hrishikesh Bhaskaran as part of a public interest letter sent to social justice department, Kerala
